text: Reminder: HubSpot has an <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/seo/view-seo-recommendations-in-HubSpot|SEO recommendations tool> built into HubSpot that helps you track down issues and suggests changes you can make.

CTA question: with the recent updates made to the CTA tool, it seems like newly created CTAs now always go to an address like <http://cta-service-cms.HubSpot.com|cta-service-cms.HubSpot.com> and then redirecting rather than appending a query string to the desired URL. Is there any way to get the previous behavior? Client is requesting that the links stay on their domain for SEO reasons, but still wants CTA analytics & actions
